title: What are some songs that are worth listening to? - Quora

response.answer_text: This all depends on taste. Now, if you would like to know more about how we acquire our music taste I recommend you to read Beau Sharbrough's answer on “How does one acquire his/her music taste?”. I like to listen to alot of different music genres. When I was younger I used to listen to Dutch musicians mostly. Now, I do not know if music in a foreign language is appealing to you, assuming you're not Dutch, nonetheless I will name a few. Het Is Een Nacht — Guus MeeuwisAls Sterren Aan De Hemel Staan — Frans BauerOnderweg — AbelRossane — Nick & SimonHet Land Van… — Lange Frans & Baas BWhen I hear those songs on the radio today I still enjoy them, even though I wouldn't play them myself, on a CD-player.. Or record player or Spotify (or whatever media player you prefer). My father plays guitar. I believe this heavily influenced my music taste. My father grew up in a different time, so he often plays older songs. I am proud to say that I can recognize almost all of them. There are some artist I have embraced from the 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s. I'll, again, name a few: Doolin Dalton — EaglesTranscendance — SantanaTrue — Spandau Ballet(They Long To Be) Close To You — CarpentersCocaine — Eric ClaptonLast year my mother gave me a record player for my birthday. This opened a whole new door for me. I discovered so many new music. When I played the first album, Simple Dreams by Linda Ronstadt (to be honest, this whole album is worth listening to), the tears stood in my eyes. Not because the album was so sad, but because I was so happy with the gift. I wanted it for so long, and then the sound… it really is different then MP3's. Some songs I love now, that I discovered on my vinyl-journey: We're All Alone — Rita CoolidgeOn The Run — Jon GibsonIt's My Life — Bon JoviWake Up Little Susie — The Everly BrothersPeacemaker — Kool & The GangI really recomand listening to all of them, so you can create your own music taste. Now, offcourse there are some other songs worth while mentioning. Here are random songs that are worthwhile to listen to: The Lion — James Bell X Bitch — Meredith BrooksDansa (Don't Quit Dancing) — Massada Can't Get Enough — Bad CompanyDer Kommissar — FalcoDrink A Beer — Luke BryanKein Liebeslied — KraftklubVivir Mi Vida — Marc AnthonyCorona — Louderdales Infinity — Guru Josh Project For now, enjoy. But remember there is more amazing music out there. This little list isn't everything.

SPRING DAY — BTS The music video is extremely amazing, vocals are great and you play the mv and the subtitles trust me there is a chance to cry Some lyrics Cherry blossoms are bloomingThe winter is endingI miss you (I miss you)I miss you (I miss you)If I wait a little longer (if I wait)If I stay up a few more nightsI’ll go see you (I’ll go see you) Thanks — Seventeen Again lyrics beautiful,Choreography beautiful and song beautiful vocals on point. The song is about thanking their fans about how far they've come Some lyrics Thank you, thank you, that’s all I can sayEven all the waiting, the longingAnd all of our memories Thank youThank you Because they’re such common wordsI was worried it wouldn’t sound sincereI was looking for something better than just thank youSo I couldn’t tell you thank you Beautiful — Monsta X UNIVERSE — EXO Vocals on point such a great music video more great if you like coffee Some lyrics I’ll search the universeUntil I can find you againI won’t let go, even the smallest memoriesMemories engraved in the seasonsThey come and go several timesBut I will still call out to you Memories always bring tears Into the new world — Girls generation Wow… one of the best debut songs ever. The lyrics are deep the title ‘ Into the new world' means like life is going to change after becoming an idol. This honestly describes how they've gone through 8/9 years together Some lyrics The longed end of wanderingI leave behind This world’sUnending sadnessI get stronger just thinking about youIt helps me so that I won’t cryWe are together, feeling this momentInto our new [world] Awake — JIN ( BTS) I legit cired wth Some lyrics Maybe I, I can never flyI can’t fly like the flower petals over thereOr as though I have wingsMaybe I, I can’t touch the skyStill, I want to stretch my hand outI want to run, just a bit more The last — AGUSTD ( SUGA BTS ) Well as many fans know suga/yoongi suffered from depression and anxiety, this song is about suffering through depression and anxiety Some lyrics On the other side of the famous idol rapperStands my weak self, it’s a bit dangerousDepression, OCDThey keep coming back again from time to timeHell no perhaps that might be my true selfDamn huh feeling estranged in realityThe conflict with ideal, my head hurtsAround the age of 18, I developed social anxietyRight, that was when my mind was gradually polluted At times I’m scared of myself tooThanks to the depression that takes over meAnd all my self hatredMin Yoongi is dead already (I killed him)Comparing my dead passion with othersIt’s now a part of my daily life On the first visit to psychiatric wardMy parents came up with meWe listened to the consultation togetherMy parents said they don’t truly understand meI don’t understand myself well eitherThen who would understand?Friends? Or you? Nobody knows me well
